biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Ric Young is a British character actor. He was born in Kuala Lumpur in 1944 as Wing-Wah Yung. He trained as an actor at the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art and then moved to Los Angeles to study method acting under Shelley Winters and Lee Strasberg. He is best known for his role as Dr. Zhang Lee in the TV series Alias (2001â€“04) and as the henchman Kao Kan in the Steven Spielberg film Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom.
